definitions: a list of planned activities or things to be done showing the times or dates when they are intended to happen or be done
a list of the times when events are planned to happen, for example the times when classes happen or when buses, etc. leave and arrive
to do less work than you planned to do by a particular point in time
to arrange that an event or activity will happen at a particular time
examples: Everything went according to schedule (= as had been planned).
The class schedule is available on the website.
a schedule of talks at the convention
We expect the building work to be completed ahead of schedule.
Managers need to know whether work is proceeding on schedule.
I'm afraid we've fallen behind schedule in recent weeks.
The meeting has been scheduled for tomorrow afternoon.
The flight is scheduled to arrive at 8.45, but it's running 20 minutes late.
